So our little baby girl is here. She will be my last child. So she got her first baby bath on Monday, August 24th, 2015. She lost her belly button on the 25th and also had her first doctor's appointment. She stopped wearing her baby mittens yesterday the 29th.. These are things I will never be able to enjoy again but my two kids and Tyler are worth it. I have been struggling with the idea for some reason. But I need to come to terms with the fact that Jonah and Tuesday are going to need all my attention and another little boy would just enrage Jonah or put that little boy under Jonah's shadow.. and another little girl would make Jonah a brother of two sisters which is no fun and it would also make Tuesday that awkward middle child. The decision I made is for the best. 
Jonah is doing well. He actually saved me on a couple occasions with Tuesday. She was crying while I was changing her and he handed her a baby doll and she stopped crying.. Then one night I was thinking she wanted to get picked up and I was telling her that I wasn't going to pick her up all the time.. Jonah runs out with a binky and puts it in her mouth and she stopped crying.. It is like they have their own brother and sister language. It is cute. Love my kids.

So I talked to the doctor today I am getting my tubes tied after having our baby girl. I understand that I am young and maybe one day I will want more children.. However, my two children are going to need me and I wouldn't have even had two if I didn't think Jonah needed to have a partner and someone to share life with if something were to happen to Tyler and I.
There is just too many people out there. I can only trust the world to take on two offspring due to the fact Tyler and I are two people who will one day pass on and our children will replace us in this world.
The doctor talked about two what ifs... What if something happened to one of your children? I am pretty sure I would be messed up for life and not being stable in the mind to even imagine having more children. 
What if your marriage falls apart and you want to have another man's children?
Well, that is a possibility I suppose.. but not only have I made a commitment to Tyler but also to my children.. I don't know how to feel about half brothers and sisters.. I will have two that are whole blood and know they came from the same DNA. If I were to be selfish enough to move on away from the family I have now perhaps I am not the best candidate to have another family anyways.
I am going to have faith in God that everything will be okay in his hands and whatever he plans I am on board with. I trust my two children with him and if we have a little girl, Tuesday Rose Hence, on August 18th, 2015. I have full faith and am surrendering to him my ability to bear more children and praying he takes care of the two we have made to roam this earth. Which are Jonah George-Jerald Hence and Tuesday Rose Hence. No more No less. Until my dying day.

So I am at the point where I am starting to get rather nervous... I have 10 days until the 18th of August which is my scheduled c-section date.
Hope all goes well.

Moment to moment you show me the way. Making your moves before you can think. Shingle by shingle lay it on out. Courage and caring build up this house.
Chorus: If you want it I'll get it. If you need I'll buy it. My love for you doesn't stay quiet.
Song to silence no words to say. But, the music keeps playing in hopes you will stay. Note by note the tune is out. Turn by turn we are fixing the sound.
Chorus.
Planet to planet, your fear of space. Put up the bars if you want to be caged. Star by star they're burning out. With a fire inside and wishes to count.
Chorus.
Person to person show me a sign. If you're at your worst then I'm doing fine. Giggle by giggle play it on out. All it takes is liking yourself.
Chorus.
Day by day times running out. No matter the subject let's not shout. Logic to senses you're all I know. Hang on tightly but lightly let go.
Last Chorus: If you want it I'll get it. If you need it I'll buy it. But my love for you has got to stay quiet.

Chords are Kapo on 2. Em C G 2 Em C G F. Chorus: G C# G D

So I am pregnant again. 30 weeks on Monday. I was trying to remember being pregnant with Jonah and all the things that are similar and different this time around.
Once I figure it all out I am going to print the experiences and make a collage for the kids.
It will include... their weight, their length,foot prints, time and date of course and all that post pregnancy stuff.
For the pregnancy part.. 
1) Cravings: Him: Buffalo Sauce Her: Eggs
2) Dislikes: Him: Hamburger Meat Her: Chocolate
3) Hobby: Him: Pokemon Cards Her: Harvest Moon: Tale of Two Towns
4) Relaxation: Him: Bubble Baths Her: Clive Owen Movies
5) Job: Him: McDonald's Management Her: 2 Year Old Daycare Teacher
6) Busy: Him: Wedding Her: 2 Year Old Son
7) Disposition: Him: Bitchy and Nervous Her: Bitchy and Sensitive
8) Location: Him: Belleview, FL: Delivered at Munroe Regional
             Her: Zephyrhills, FL: Delivered at Zephyrhills Hospital
9) Conceived: Him: December 11th, 2011 Her: November 15th, 2014
10) First Felt Movement: Him: 18 weeks Her: 11 weeks
11) Mommy's Weight: Him: Full Term 169lbs Her: At 30 weeks 164lbs
12) Description: Him: Lazy Baby but Strong Kicks at Night Time
                 Her: Moving all the time and Knees a lot
Common: 
1) Heart Burn
2) Sick all the way through

So lately a lot has been going on. I have been on the red path towards happiness and I guess I am just afraid I am going to go back to the old ways of Jean. The lists, the mundane lifestyle, and always putting myself on the back burner. Not that putting yourself last is wrong it is just I need to be happy now. I know deep down it isn't Tyler's fault but for some reason I keep blaming him. Maybe it is because he a lot of times is negative and I feel like that does effect me in a sense. This whole other guy scenario isn't working out either. He is very unavailable and full of himself. I know he cares for me but I don't mean to put myself out there that much. Even though he believes he would be the best lover I have ever had I think it might be opposite then I will never get rid of him. So what my plan is is to take time to myself. Then focusing on Jonah, then Tyler, and then Mom. Need to get back to my roots but in a happy and healthy way. Thank you dude for waking me up. But I am sorry you are no longer needed. Never told you but I am a little bit cruel. ;)
Alright then..
Peace.

So the next day we went with my Aunt Sandy on a long car ride through the mountains. It was pretty pleasant Tyler and I were flirting in the back like young lovers. I don't need anymore than what I have I realized. It is just fun sometimes to tease yourself. 

We just hung out and ate dinner after we returned to the reunion house.

We got all packed up and the kids did a talent show that was so cute. We played a little games and I had a glass of wine. Then we retired to the bedroom. The kids staying next to us I had to tell to settle down... feeling so old.

The next morning we got up at 6 am and left. It was a relatively nice 8 hour car ride. When we got home we just hung out until bed time.

Today is my chore day. I have also decided this thing with Don is nothing serious at all. I love my husband and I only want him.

Today I was thinking to myself what a lovely life I have. I love my little boy, Jonah, more than life itself. I have a wonderful and loving husband. Our reunion is coming up. I like my job as a shift manager at McDonald's most days. But above all I know in my heart of hearts that I am have many blessings. I thank God for every day I wake up and no chaos is forming. 


I know change is bound to occur but for right now I am truly happy.


I wish everyone had the peace of mind I have at these few moments in time.

I actually had an awesome day at work.. no 200s and my shift ran so smooth. After work I took my mom shopping for stuff for her new room. Then when I came home I took a little siesta and then did the turtle tank and got Jonah was and bathed. Then on top of all that I saved Shelly from getting eating by our neighbors dog because she decided she wanted to go exploring tonight and find a way out of the yard. 

Well as for right now I have formula to make and an N64 to play but I will make sure and check in more periodically.

The regiment seems to be working well I am still on the same one.

I think the best part of it is how Ty pampers me on Wednesdays and I pamper him on Thursday. Above all we need to keep that going :) 

Besides that all is well.

Checking out.

Wednesdays are your day. Thursdays are Tyler's day.

So last night I had a nightmare. It goes like this:
  Tyler and I were at a medical center that was hosting a talent show. We were waiting out turn out in the audience and I was staring of into space when I caught eyes with a dark haired, older gentleman, with glasses on. He gently smiled at me and that made me smile considering when I caught eyes with him it made me uncomfortable. I then averted my eyes to the person sitting next to me's newspaper. Jonah was seated on the other side of this person and Tyler was in front of them. The person handed Jonah to me and I said, "You are a good boy." Then Jonah who at this point had a head full of bleach blonde hair exclaimed, "Ima good boy, Ima good boy." Tyler and I looked at eachother in shock then looked around and said, "Those were his first words." We smiled at eachother and then they called our names to play our song. I gave Jonah to the person with the paper and headed on up. We played our song and then sat back down. The audience called for an encore and Tyler and I looked down the hallway and Cory was coming to play with Tyler. I smiled at Cory and he looked at Jonah then smiled at me. Tyler and him started to play. At the same time as the audience was telling Tyler they couldn't hear him because he was too far away from the mic a doctor who looked like einstien came and said he wanted to take Jonah for a check up. Being distracted by Tyler I said, "Fine go ahead." Because it seemed normal to me. 
Meanwhile on stage Tyler dropped his mic trying to grab it to bring it closer to himself and he got that frustrated look on his face but still carried on. Behind me around six seats Cheech Marin and his family sat. The doctor came back and was saying, "It was a fever." I thought he was talking about Jonah so I stood up. Cheech Marin then proceeded after the doctor yelling. I followed but then quickly doubled back and asked another man who looked exactly like Cheech Marin as well if he had seen where they went. His baby was facing backwards in a car seat and making weird noises and I asked how old the baby was and the wife responded about two. I then panicked when I realized something fishy was going on and I screamed to Tyler, "They have taken the baby and they won't give him back." Tyler who looked very sweaty came running down the hall and we followed in the footsteps of Cheech and the doctor. We ended up on a rooftop. I was the only on to jump off. I landed in a small closet off of a garage. A motorcycle pulled into the garage as I hid in the shadows housed by the closet. A man approached the other man on the bike. They did an exchange that seemed to me like a drug deal. Then the man standing shot the man on the bike and dragged his body and the bike out of the garage. Then an old time car pulled in and the doctor got out. I had no weapons in the closet so I didn't get out I just figured I would follow him. But a little boy with brown hair and glasses pulled me out the sidedoor of the closet and told me he knew where they take the patients. I followed him and as we talked about how they were taking children and cutting their brain in a certain way to make it so when they were adults they would be admitted here because of mental illness I picked up pennies and the little boy started to wheeze. I came up behind him and held him. I said, "Its okay you just are walking to fast we need to sit down." He replied, "No we have to find your baby." We kept walking and came to a feild with many movie theatres along the sides. I said, "I see why he likes movie theatres, because he likes watching people. Then we came to the rooftop again and there was a girl with a big nose skinny legaments and she was bald. And she said you cant go any further. I told her I needed to find my son and when she had children she would understand. And she said if I were you I wouldnt have let the doctor hold my two children either. And with that I jumped off the roof again back into the closet off of the garage because in my mind he would return to the garage with his car and I would follow him again. A woman on a motorcycle pulled in this time and was greeted by another woman. The woman with the bike turned around and held up her phone light in my direction and the other woman shot her and said, "Who are you calling?" I sat in silence then she said,"You in the closet come out here." I explained to her my situation as she held me at gun point. She replied, "A kid that young? you are never going to get him back."

My son was born a week ago tomorrow. I am so smitten he is the cutest thing I have ever seen in my whole existance. I am in love. I am happy and whole again. I thank the lord and pray he knows how much I appreciate everything he has ever given me. 
Just to let myself and everyone know, pregnancy sucks. In the first trimester you are sick all the damn time and you feel achy due to your bones shifting. The second trimester you start feeling weird in the head, some days you are lazy as shit and then others you are organizing cabinets. The third trimester is the worst. The heartburn gets so bad, your back hurts you cant get out of beds or chairs. Your feet swell, and you are nervous about the new addition to your family.
Labor for me wasn't so bad. I had a scheduled c-section due to my small body.. following in my mother's footsteps. When I heard his little cry though, it was the most overwhelmed feeling ever.. it made both Tyler and I tear up.. and his little face with bubbles coming out of his mouth.. after I saw him I got sewn up and brought to the recovery room.. I was messed up by the time I got to my room to see everyone. During the next four days we played house at the hospital and felt out parenthood and I was slightly happy. But having him here at home with us and being a family is the most delicate and hopeful thing. I never thought about my future.. But if this is it I am so happy and grateful. Just cleaning this house and watching him grow will keep me completely content.. I am blessed with a healthy son and a very loving husband. Also the great family we have around us is nice too. I love the world.

Just because people stifled what is beautiful about you and even though you helped make what is so beautiful about me.. I can't let you stifle what can be so beautiful about me anymore. I gotta go. Sorry and I will always love you. I never thought I would be one of those people who abandoned you Momma... But the farther and the more distant we get the more I get these flashbacks of the bad times.. But when you are close to me all I want to see is the good times and how we have this magical thing going on.. But I dont have time to be seduced by these lies anymore. I need to let you go. I am so sorry for the way things have turned out for you. And if you ever need me I will be here, but only if you need me truly. No more shannagans. No more conspiracies. I am more than just your little bitch I am a human. I love a man who is now my husband. I am about to figure out if I am a crappy mother. Above all though I need to learn how to love right again. You make my love feel like a sick game. I don't want to play games.. I want to feel in love again. Please take care of yourself for heaven sake. I don't think you wanted grown daughters anyway Mom. I think your parents ruined your view on grown up life period. I have to save myself from the same fate.
I really do love you.. and I am so sorry that Come What May pauses here until we can have a healthy relationship if we ever can.
I will miss the good parts in you and I promise I will use all the good things with Jonah you used with us a kid. I already sing Melanie to him everytime I take a bath. I feel better because this is the only time I have ever got to talk with you without being shut down. Our insecurities just ruined Tuesdays and all that was special between us. The situations that followed were carelessness and bad juju. I hope the hearing goes well so you can have a second chance at freedom.. just use it right this time. I won't be here to mess it up for you. Peace in, Peace out, Peace all around.. and little bunny foo foo too.
Love you Momma.
-Your daughter Jean, an old friend

Okay so a new theory. There is five things I need to worry about doing on a daily basis. Beauty, Happiness, House Cleaning, Soul, and Finances.
Beauty- Hair, Face, Clothing, Nails, and Health.
Happiness- Jonah, Tyler, Arlo/Shelly, Mozi, and Turtles.
Jonah= Feed, Brain, Play, Sleep, and Hygene.
Tyler= Hungry, Green, Sex, Supported, and Loved.
Arlo/Shelly= Fed, Groomed, Attended to, Outside, and Water.
Mozi= Fed, Petted, and Litterbox.
Turtles= Clean and Fed.
House Cleaning= Travel Path, Tidy, Dishes, Counters, and Specials.
Soul= Faith, Talent, Delicacy, Fun, and Grateful.
Finances= Bills, Presidents, and Extra.
Washington= Rainy Day
Lincoln= Christmas
Hamilton= Summer
Jefferson= Wish Wallet
Grant= Groceries
Franklin= Savings

So Mom ended up in Jail. I don't know what to do for her. I just sent a letter and I have a visitation on Tuesday at 1pm. She shouldn't have been messing with Carol.
I had a dream last night she was trying to make me mow Grandma's lawn and when she ask me to come back tomorrow which in my dream was Thursday. 
I told her I couldn't because I had stuff to do and she treated me like I was lying.
I dunno what the dream was supposed to mean. But today I think I am going to spend time having fun and figuring out my office space :) 
Well god bless and I hope God is watching over Momma too.

So Tyler and I got married. We had an awesome are having an awesome time on our honeymoon. The only obligatory things I have to get done is writing down what the plans are and finding my mother because no one seems to know where she is. The other night she was over at my Grandmas and she fell down drunk. They say the cops and the emts came so no telling where she ended up. 
But as for the plans I need to write down my main daily things and the july errand list. I might want to get my prenatals, groceries, and the name changing stuff done too. Maybe a scimmage of house work as well.

So lately we have not been getting along. I admit I have been hard on her to make changes for the better. Telling her things I had no right to like how she needs to clean her house if she doesn't want to get kicked out. But I am the one who picks up all the damn pieces every time she lets everything in her life fall a part like she has done countless times. Well lately she has not been there for me. It is always about her feelings or what is going on with her. She claims that she has been fair and patient but I know better. Mom and I have been best friends along with mother and daughter for a while and maybe that was the biggest mistake of all because now not only am I short of a best friend but I realized I traded my Mom for a friend years ago. She says she will be at my wedding I dunno if she will though and on top of that she might act out and I will just have to suck it up. She probably won't be there for the birth of my son because she refuses to accept that Tyler is a good man. I am just done with never having a conclusion to this madness. So I asked her, "Do you want to try again and we both will be only positive towards eachother and not bring up the past?" She then brought up the past and talked bad about Ty. So I said, "So you don't want to try?" And she said, "I will be at your wedding but after that it is over." So I will give her a hug before heading off to Amelia Island and I will say goodbye to my mother for now.
I really don't see how she will fit in my future life with the way she acts. I can't be put down all the time and have Tyler hear dirty messages left for him all the time. I will go visit her just to see how she is once a month. But I plan on getting my number changed. She can call my cell if she needs me. I am just sad that a love so pure got ruined so badly by situations and the both of us. We could have done so much better.
I love my mother more than anyone in this world but I need to walk the red path and she only turns my head other ways. She can only hurt me now. She refuses to let anyone truly help her. If she heals herself I still would have trust issues with her. I am sorry that finally I am like all the rest and I have to let her go. I will miss her and I will always hold the times we had with the most honor. And I promise I will always honor my mother just from a far. I hope God understands I need to heal now too.

I am Jean. I was raised by a woman who prided herself on being alone. I know how to be alone. It just saddens me to realize that all those whom I love besides Tyler have in their own sense abandoned me. My whole life I have made sure these people knew I loved them. They don't call me.. I call them. They don't travel to come see me I travel to them. When around them I have to form to their fitting. In all senses they all see me as a chump and I know this. Lately I have just been noticing the things about the world I don't want my child to endure. He will never be a chump. I know who I am I know I love strong and give people around me enough space to grow.
The lessons I have learned my whole life I am once again over veiwing. I remember all the times I have worried about those I love and I also know myself to be evasive at times as well. But I warn those around me. I am more dangerous now than I have ever been before. You have one chance to decide who you want to be in my life now. Because it is all about the love of my life now and he is not Tyler. He is just a part of him. I will be Jean my whole existance but I am no longer wreckless Jean. I am no longer push over and run over Jean. I am Jean mother of Jonah. I will not be conquered and I shall not care for those who shame me and my family.
I have always been able to do without. When you offer to help I decline then when pushed I accept. Just be ware that I might not be very important to the world or even to you. But I am the stranger who smiled at you and you passed by without even wandering who I was or how I might feel inside. Always looking for a certain answer in my responses and underestimating my competancy I know how you think. I watched you my whole life, it is your laziness that kept you in the dark about me. 
The whole time you said you understood my struggles but you never lifted a finger to help. You threw materials at me. You tought me that you feel normal and that I was not normal. I have always been miles away and been waiting on a train ticket back to love. Now I have that ticket. It was not sent by any of you however. I was sent a ticket by my lord. He knows I know how to love and how to nurture and he never thinks I am stupid or make careless decisions. He knows I know I will only die and that life is his blessing. He knows I have watched all of you and cared about you. I will never care again what anyone thinks of me. I will do what is needed to be done and return to God. Once I deliver Jonah into this world I will have left more than enough to pay back the world for its bedding. Mom just called to tell me how shitty I am once again. This is why I must stop caring.. Conditioning me only to become suicidal, that is why existance alone is fine.. atleast most times it is quiet.

Okay so the set up went like this.. during the first half of my vacation I would wake up and make my bed go down stairs and eat breakfast.. after breakfast I would go take a nice hot bath followed by a shower and get into my bathrobe. I would call Momma and dry off for a bit then get into my clothes.. I would hang out for a while and read my Carl Haaisen book.. Tyler, Nicci, Rusty, and I would find some fun thing to do to fill up our morning such as swimming under the covered bridge, playing frisbee, or taking a hike. Then eat lunch and climb up the stairs and into our beds for an afternoon nap. When we awoke we would find some other interesting thing to do until it was time to feast at dinner.. Once dinner was over we would burn it off by going down to the creek near where we stayed at. We would pace across the field and hurry up stairs to fill our cups with the finest of alcohols. After we felt pretty good we would go out to our table with the perfect amount of chairs and played the board games of our choice. Tyler would tuck me in after the game was finished and I would read until my eyes felt heavy enough to shut and have my dreams.

Okay new regiment.. this is going to help me lose weight... Need to get Acai Berry, Colonthin, and Multi Vitamins.. Multi Vitamin Morning.. Colon thin mid day and Acai Berry B4 bed.. One coffee, soft drink then rest water at work.. One Soda, then water, then Juice at home.. 
Need to make sure we do work out routines.. Lemon wedge and spoon of maple syrup once a day. Cajun pepper on meals.. 

Also for mental health write life lessons once a day such as when in doubt stand still. Today's went like this.. I saw a rainbow and I felt it was a gift for me to see this on this day so I picked up the phone to call Tyler to share it with someone and the rainbow disappeared.. I thought it was saying "Not everything should be shared." But in the car when Tyler called me back it arrived again.. This time I think I understood the message.. "You should try to share everything but if you can't and it is all yours it is okay too."

That is today's word.

Today I was in my car and I started thinking about a lot of things. For one why do I push myself so hard am I proving myself to the great spirit, my mother, my father, myself, or everyone else? What am I hoping to get.. the actuality of being a part of a whole goodness or am I just a glutton for compliments? I don't know anymore.. I don't know where I am going or what I want.. I am just trucking on and pushing myself to the limits for what it seems to be no reason.
Love is a hard thing to comprehend sometimes..

Dear Mom,
 I love you so much in truth you are so innocent but at the same time corrupt by all those who have hurt you.
You are the rainbow behind the light rain. But I just wanted to describe to you the way you hurt me and the ways you make me feel so good just so I understand better.
 How you hurt me is easy to describe; You and the weather have similarities you both are bright and sunshiny or dark and windy. Some days there is a light rain that soothes the soul on the other hand there is your storms that rip everyone in your way apart. I am just the monument in your little town that watches others come in and build factories and warns them on my label not to build here because they will be unprosperous and your land is protected by the spirit. And yet the storms of your land still tear at me just the same as those who you wish out. I am just different because I will always be there by only the will of myself as your monument. I want to have a place that is peaceful in your town.. it will make my time spent there so much more pleasant.
  How you make me feel so good; You make me feel like you love me so much and I am enough to make the sunshine come out in your world.. that is all a person could ever hope to be to someone else.
I love you more than words can say the only ones I know that come close are "Come What May" and I mean those words.
Sincerely and with the love of you better or worse,
       Jean
